Articles.Content:
Don't know if this is the correct forum or not. I'm playing a modded game (a few planet packs, parts packs, etc). From time to time my save "breaks" my VAB. Don't know what causes it, nor if it can be fixed. Essentially, the upper right buttons (save, open, launch) don't work and I have to manually kill the game and reboot. If I start a new game, all works fine. Any ideas as to what may be causing this and if there is a way to save my save?!

More info can certainly be required if you think it would help with the diagnostics... If it matters, I'm playing on a Mac.

Thanks in advance.
